RSS NewsTarget.com Brighteon.com Censored.news Brighteon.social Medical Shocker: Sqaulene, an oil-based âadjuvantâ commonly used in vaccines, likely a leading cause of catastrophic diseases, including auto-immune disease Monday, January 06, 2020 by: adjuvant vaccine , Autoimmune disorders , badhealth , , , deception , fibromyalgia cure , side effects , squalene toxic , squalene vaccine , toxic ingredients , toxins , vaccine ingredients , vaccine toxins , vaccines , vaccines fail , vaccines spread disease Bypass censorship by sharing this link: https://www.distributednews.com/400276.html Copy URL ( )  One thing the CDC hopes nobody ever learns is that oil-based adjuvants commonly used in vaccines can cause irreversible auto-immune disease and permanent organ damage.

Whenever scientists want to purposely induce autoimmune diseases in laboratory animals, they use oil-based adjuvants that create incurable conditions, including the stoppage of sperm production , allergic encephalomyelitis (animal version of MS), and inflammation of the nerves that can easily lead to paralysis.

Ever heard of the term âbreak tolerance?â That means your immune system fails toÂ recognize your own body, and it shifts into self-destruction âmode,â attacking what itâs supposed to defend.

Dangerous vaccine ingredients like aluminum salts and squalene cause the immune system to go completely haywire, despite the lies that weâre told about âhyper-activatingâ the system to create antibodies.

Understand that the human body contains several types of oily lipids and molecules naturally, so when an oil is injected by vaccine into your muscle tissue (think squalene oil here), there is an even more intense response called a âcross reactionâ where the immune system chaotically seeks to destroy ANY OILS found in the body that resemble the ones injected.
One example of this highly destructive vaccine-induced chaos is called multiple sclerosis.
All vaccine scientists are well-aware that squalene causes severe autoimmune diseases in lab animals.
Given that rats, guinea pigs, rabbits and monkeys haveÂ up to 99% similar genes (DNA) and immune systems to humans, the horrid facts come spilling out of the immunization vials of history.
Back in the 1970s, researchers from UCLA Medical School injected squalene into guinea pigs and rats.
It caused the animals to contract multiple sclerosis and rheumatoid arthritis.
The CDC will tell you that squalene occurs naturally in the body, so itâs perfectly safe, but theyâre leaving out crucial information.
When squalene gets injected into humans, the immune system makes antibodies to it.
In a formulation better known as MF59, squalene was used in the highly experimental anthrax vaccine during the Gulf War, causing systemic lupus erythematosus.
This dangerous squalene-induced disease was conveniently labeled âGulf War Syndromeâ in order to protect the insidious vaccine industry back home.

25 Peer-reviewed scientific papers reveal squalene-based adjuvants induce autoimmune disease in animals Yes, the scientific community of crooks and shills that front for the vaccine industry love to claim there are no peer-reviewed studies to back up the fact that todayâs vaccines are dangerous, experimental, and more of a detriment to human health than a benefit.
They are not worth the risk, and evidence-based science from 10 different laboratories in Asia, Australia, Europe and the beloved United States backs all that up.
Realize thatÂ dozens of peer-reviewed scientific papers reveal squalene-based adjuvants induce autoimmune disease in animals.
Squalene alone can completely devastate the central nervous system and brain, causing catastrophic injury thatâs irreversible.

âGulf War Syndromeâ was basically a laundry list of side effects and permanent disabilities resulting from the injection of squalene, including chronic headaches, fibromyalgia, photosensitive rashes, memory loss, chronic diarrhea, seizures, Lou Gehrigâs disease (ALS), and even Raynaudâs phenomenon.Â You can also findÂ toxic squalene in flu shots.

Soldiers and other military personnel even tested positive for anti-squalene antibodies — the ultimate and definitive marker for the development of catastrophic diseases, including auto-immune diseases, exactly mirrored by experimental lab animals injected with oil-based âadjuvantsâ like the ones used in MF59.

Human immune system identifies SQUALENE molecule as an enemy to attack and eliminate Because squalene is naturally found throughout the brain and nervous system, once it is injected via vaccine, the body sends the message to attack its own system.
This has been tracked using radioactive tracers in animals.
Thatâs why most vaccines are highly dangerous, and not worth the risk.
Itâs all based on the way the squalene enters the body.
Consider this very carefully.
You see, if you eat squalene, thereâs no problem, because you can easily digest it.

But if you inject it, and scientists all know this by now, you galvanize the immune system to attack and eliminate it, and since squalene is located throughout your CNS and brain, youâre in for big trouble.
Now you can understand why vaccines truly are the culprit of the autism epidemic in this country.
Vaccine scientists know this.
Vaccines spread disease more than they prevent it.
Anyone who gets vaccinated with any immunization shot should immediately go home and remain there for two weeks so as not to spread the live viruses they just got injected into their muscle tissue.
Itâs called shedding and it is scientifically proven to be true.
The truth has been uncovered by science and evidence-based research thatâs peer-reviewed in different countries around the world.

Tune your internet dial to Vaccines.news for updates on how the highly corrupt vaccine industry uses adjuvants, excipients, emulsifiers and genetically modified virus strains to infect Americans for profit.
